description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning

Standard, At-Will

Reach 4

+34 vs AC; 2d8+10 plus 2d6 lightning damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

Reach 4

+32 vs AC; 2d6+10 damage.

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

The dragon makes a gore attack and two claw attacks.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Thunder

Move, Recharge

The dragon flies up to 12 squares and attacks with its wings at the end of its move: reach 4; +34 vs Fortitude; 3d10+8 thunder damage. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Lightning

Standard, Recharge

+34 vs Reflex; 3d12+22 lightning damage. Miss: Half damage. This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter ✦ Lightning

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately. This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard, Encounter

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +34 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Thunder

Standard, At-Will

Close burst 3

+34 vs Fortitude; 2d10+8 thunder damage, and the target is stunned until the end of the blue dragon's next turn. Critical Hit: As above, except that the target is stunned (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Lightning

Standard, At-Will

Area burst 4 within 20

+34 vs Reflex; 5d6+8 lightning damage. Miss: Half damage.

Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Athletics +34, Insight +23, Nature +23Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 28 | Insight 33
